info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 11:13AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN BEAVER...EASTERN LAWRENCE...BUTLER...NORTHERN ALLEGHENY AND WEST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG COUNTIES... At 1113 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was located 7 miles north of Zelienople, or 10 miles west of Butler, moving southeast at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Butler, Ellwood City, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Meridian, Zelienople, Slippery Rock, Meadowood, Oak Hills, Sarver, Evans City, Big Beaver, Saxonburg, New Beaver, Nixon, Ellport, Prospect, Curtisville, Chicora, and Harmony. This includes Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 84 and 110. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
